title: Mobile Microlearning for Circular Economy and Sustainability Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of industrial systems engineering or related fields, understanding of sustainability concepts
context.additional_context: A corporate in-house training program for current practitioners, offering flexible learning through mobile devices in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze actual SME cases to concretely propose implementation plans for circular economy principles
Learners can explain waste reduction problem-solving processes with 80% accuracy using Kolb’s Experiential Learning Cycle’s four stages
Learners can collaboratively derive three sustainability solutions by participating in team-based discussion activities on mobile platforms
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
